item.title: 📜 sempicanha/commilink (71 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: sempicanha

📝 Repository: sempicanha/commilink

📄 Descrizione: CommiLink (CMLK) is a hybrid, secure communication protocol with multi-transport support, end-to-end encryption (E2EE), relay/store-and-forward, message rooms, and message revocation via tombstones. Designed for IoT, mobile, and web applications requiring resilient and reliable messaging.

⭐ Stelle: 71

🍴 Forks: 15

🏷️ Topics: iot multi-transport nostr onpostt protocol relay sms websocket
